body_html:
In principle, there's no problem in registering a kernel only for GPU. Kepler (CC 3.0, I think) is the minimum for TF anyway, so no problem there either. We may even be able to dispatch to the kernel from contrib.layers.layer_norm, but that may be a bit of a hack. More probably, it'll be a separate op that you can call instead of the layer.

I think you should try merging this into contrib, please send a PR!
